title: 3v3 Rise of trolls/toxic
body: I just played a game as gnar in 3v3 and had 2 maybe duo or something. i got ganked several times and i was fine i know i was playing too far forward but trynd afk farming as normal i said to him hay trynd can you please gank as he was pushing up all the time so i ended up not getting an answer and i told him that in order to win in 3v3 you need to be ahead and afk farming won't get you anywhere his answer to everything was "your so toxic" "useless Gnar" "Good job on feeding Gnar" "Report Gnar" and the diana ended up afk farming bot when i was ulting all 3 in the wall and stuff easy triple for her nope afk farmed and was very hard to see how i was toxic i said nothing that game except for that trynd part and probs the hi and all in champ selection and they told everyone to report me for toxic behaviour when i wasn't even saying anything and i was the one trying they were the ones being toxic and afking…….

replies.body:
I get this in 2/3 games easily, players who don't know what to do in TT.

Last game I had an MF who sat in bot lane 90% of the game, she roamed top once during the game and a second time when the enemy was at our inhibitor tower. The top lane Nasus was the same, sat in top lane most of the game.

In team select they said they will duo bot lane, but I chose a jungler, so I could easily assume they were duo. They didn't roam, they didn't ping, the usual, but of course I was being blamed for having a bad attitude and all that jazz.

I'm so used to it I just let it go, nothing much you can do.
